title: This game is fucking stupid
body:
Just played a game, anivia mid, not like thats at all relevant but anyway. My toplaner jax fed enemy nasus like 7 kills so obviously my team were crying like girls and spamming "ff20 report jax", 25 minutes in I started talking in chat for the first time just to tell everyone to stfu and play, stop focusing on "reporting" people and just play the fucking game. So naturally, the team turn on me /all report anivia ty
Now im banned for 14 days, such is life.

#leagueofchildren
